description:
First of all, cool idea.
Really helps with designing of icons instead of browsing Google Icons or Bootstrap Icons to find the perfect one. The best feature it offers is SVG exporting.
In the future you should consider adding a history of files that can be opened again after closing the app, but that's not as important as adding an option to set a custom background. Design people should test the icon on different backgrounds.
I've talked in this review like the app is for icon generating purposes, but I can't seem to find another use for it since it's the best use the author could ask for.
5/5 has potential
Excellent tool to make ui icons
It's a cute app which could really be amazing with a little more love.
Does what it says. No hiccups.
Nice app but, confusing to understand the curving mechanism.
summary: Nice app but, confusing to understand the curving mechanism

description: Summary says it all, program is superb. Just impossible to edit. If I find I've made a mistake early on, I must undo EVERYTHING just to fix one little line... Add an edit function, 5 stars hands down.
summary: Superb, just needs an edit function

description:
Idea of this little cool app is just amazing. Im professional designer myself and this way of making icons is very fast and simple. 

I would add line effects like width, color, shadows and shape in next updates!
Really fun to create things with it. Thank you!
Solo hace falta una herramienta de selección para eliminar lineas específicas y una que permita aumentar el grosor de lineas específicas.
